author: cnbc.com
title: Corporate Lawyer Joins Norton Rose Fulbright in San Francisco
text:
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Norton Rose Fulbright today announced that Lior Nuchi, a versatile corporate, M&A and securities lawyer, has joined the global law firm as a partner in its San Francisco office. He comes to Norton Rose Fulbright from McGuireWoods LLP.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180410006197/en/
Lior Nuchi, Norton Rose Fulbright (Photo: Business Wire)
Nuchi advises leading technology companies, investment banks and venture capital firms on public offerings, mergers and acquisitions and corporate governance, SEC reporting and FINRA and exchange matters.
Nuchi also represents clients with respect to intellectual property protection and litigation. In this capacity, he counsels on patent strategy and prosecuting strategic patents, monetizing companies’ patent portfolios and acquiring strategic patents.
Daryl Lansdale, Norton Rose Fulbright’s US Managing Partner, said:
“Lior manages complex corporate and venture capital matters for clients across several sectors, many of which complement his experience in intellectual property law.”
Gene Lewis, Norton Rose Fulbright’s US Head of Business Practice, commented:
“Lior is experienced in corporate issues that span the venture capital-intellectual property spectrum. His vast knowledge and focus on superior service will greatly benefit our clients.”
Nuchi, who also speaks German, Hebrew and Japanese and has previously practiced in Tel Aviv, Hong Kong and Tokyo, in addition to San Francisco, said:
“Norton Rose Fulbright is a premier global law firm with elite capabilities worldwide. I have always been active in global technology matters, and Norton Rose Fulbright provides the perfect footprint for me to further expand my practice.”
Nuchi received his JD from the New York University School of Law and a BA from Columbia University. He is admitted to practice in California.
Notes for editors:
Norton Rose Fulbright
Norton Rose Fulbright is a global law firm providing the world’s preeminent corporations and financial institutions with a full business law service. The firm has more than 4,000 lawyers and other legal staff based in Europe, the United States, Canada, Latin America, Asia, Australia, Africa and the Middle East.
Recognized for its industry focus, Norton Rose Fulbright is strong across all the key industry sectors: financial institutions; energy; infrastructure, mining and commodities; transport; technology and innovation; and life sciences and healthcare. Through its global risk advisory group, the firm leverages its industry experience with its knowledge of legal, regulatory, compliance and governance issues to provide clients with practical solutions to the legal and regulatory risks facing their businesses.
Norton Rose Fulbright operates in accordance with its global business principles of quality, unity and integrity, aiming to provide the highest possible standard of legal service in each of its offices and to maintain that level of quality at every point of contact.
Norton Rose Fulbright Verein, a Swiss verein, helps coordinate the activities of Norton Rose Fulbright members but does not itself provide legal services to clients. Norton Rose Fulbright has offices in more than 50 cities worldwide, including London, Houston, New York, Toronto, Mexico City, Hong Kong, Sydney and Johannesburg. For more information, see nortonrosefulbright.com/legal-notices .
